abstract: Skillfully smudged eyes, beginning with black pencil and shadow, help create that undead style.
snippet: Skillfully smudged eyes, beginning with black pencil and shadow, help create that undead style.
lead_paragraph: At Carine Roitfeld's bal des vampires in Paris this month for her book "Irreverent," the hostess and guests, like the model Anja Rubik, in a gothic lace-up velvet number, showed that high-fashion vamp calls for skillfully smudged eyes. "Start by lining inside and underneath the lash line, then the entire lid with black pencil," the makeup artist Kristin Hilton advises.
